casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Joel Martin SELMAN, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157656
COA: 333484 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 12, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, having received notice that the defendant-appellant died during the pendency of this appeal, the application for leave to appeal the March 1, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is DISMISSED. See People v. Peters , 449 Mich. 515 , 537 N.W.2d 160 (1995).
